   sphinx-quickstart on Thu May 26 15:16:34 2022.
   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Instrument Reader's documentation!
=============================================
**py_instruments** is a python project to read in data files of various instruments and return formatted pandas dataframes.

The project is licensed under GPL v3.
A copy of the GNU General Public License can be found in the LICENSE.md file that
comes along with this program, or see http://www.gnu.org/licenses/.

This documentation is generated automatically using `sphinx <https://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/master/>`_, which visualizes the code structure, content and docstrings as a webpage.



.. note::

	This project is under active development.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   readme
   modules
   contributing
